sub_title: Desksite Support Engineer at FDS a DXC Technology Company
summary:
I'm responsable for 2nd line resolving technical calls, supporting users with software and hardware problems. Training skills for new engineers as a senior. Also do Projects for Technology for current customer. Eager to learn new technology. Always looking for new job challenges.

Skills  

Making Business contacts peer to peer based, resulting of casting new projects for our company
Challenging new technology and implement this into current enviroment.
Apply company law knowledge and Security
Asset Manager (ITSM - CMDB, Remedy, Archibus, HP Spider, Service Desk+)
Backup / Restore Specialist (ARC-server 6.61, 2000 and Veritas)
Dameware NT Utilities and RDP
Dutch: Speaks, reads and writes the language
English: Speaks, reads and writes the language 
German: Reads and speaks the language 
Hardware Engineer - Desktop/Laptop/Printers
Make effective and timely decisions
Microsoft Office Excel, Word
Microsoft Windows NT 4.0, 95, 98, 2000 and XP Professional, 7, 8 and 10
Local problem solver Laser Printer (HP + Xerox +Ricoh + Canon) 
Provide ITIL Configuration / Incident Management consultancy and support
Telecommunications Technician (Ericsson DBC 213, 212 models, Isdn and Vox centrals)
Voip support (IP-phones) Cisco, Polycom and Avaya.
Datacommunications Specialist (Patching and making CAT 5, 6, ISDN/PABX Centrals)
Technical support on Visual Telecommunication (Tandberg, Polycom and Cisco, Skype)

Certifications  

Microsoft Vista Training Cert.
Microsoft Networking Essentials Windows 2000 server
MCP 2.0 - Microsoft Cert Prof.
MCDST - Microsoft Certified Desktop Support Technician XP
MCPS 2.0 AOS: Microsoft Systembuilders
MCNPS 2.0 AOS: Hardware Solutions Competency - System Building
MCITP Vista Enterprise support
MCITP Windows 7 Professional

Specialties: Peer to peer contacts, Quality Control, High quality end to end to customers, Big projects as assisting in repopulating new buildings, working/implementing with new technology and small/big move projects.

education.field_of_study: HAVO-MBO: English, Dutch, Biology, Mathematics, Social/Child psychology and Computer Science (PDI)
MAVO and Job Orientation year: Dutch, Mathematics, Natural Science
MAVO: English, Dutch, Mathematics, Biology, Natural Science and Chemistry
Dutch, English, German, French, Economics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, Gym.

awards.title: Silver Excellence Award
awards.description: Award for good work, flexibility and engagement in an VodafoneZiggo project Helmond (150 workplaces) and closing site Eindhoven Esp (140 workplaces) after 10 years of use. It was a hard time to do project duo to Covid, special thanks to; Yves Rondagh (Project leader), Nancy Schreurs and Ilse Oberndorff from Facilicom, IT team Ziggo and team from UTS, again Avex helped me getting my goals in too; to stick out with me.

awards.title: Bonus award from Vodafone/Hemmersbach
awards.description: For my dedication and effort to accomplishment the project in time! VodafoneZiggo Utrecht CO. VodafoneZiggo given me the award in name of my company. Proud to get the job done with a team in 7 to 9 weeks time, we managed to get 2200+ workplaces done, more then 40 Video communicationrooms Cisco and Teams done and installed most AP's. Special thanks to Arjan Thijssen (Project leader) , Leo Hoogerwerf (colleague and friend) , Infrastructure team and the compleet team of Avex for a job well done.

awards.title: Bonus Award Hemmersbach GmbH
awards.description:
Saving the name of the company, facial loss, by hiring the correct person to do the job on site. Site Vodafone VPC was not happy about current upholded engineer on site. Unable to fill the job, it was my doing to get the right hire in. The company al most lost foothold of an EMEA north contract. My alternative way of approaching it got me this award. However it was insulting my intelligence in the reward it was 50 euro wel spent saving revenue for 8 million. 
Thanks Suzan Henkle, Maurice Ramakers from DXC and Teamleader VPC Patrick Lellig for the trust in me.

awards.title: HP CDS LIPS Award - Highest Leads winner 2012 and 2013
awards.description: Winning income and harvest project within customer Vodafone 2012 and 2013 has lead to win the lead award 2x in a row, as reward HP printer has been given to me in 2012 and a bonus in 2013. CDS started a leads campaign within internalships engineers. Doing this in that manner got me winning two times in a row with annual projects casting in extra money between 20k and 30k a year.

awards.title: Bronze Knights Order 'De Gaaspiep vaan Minckeleers'
awards.description: Duo my dedication and outstanding IT Services for account Vodafone, received this prestige knight order with honor by Vodafone.

projects.title: MarCom Project FDS
projects.description:
Creating ideas for branding FDS company and getting foothold to setup spotlights for FDS. Getting chances to setup event within company and hope to do the same more events in the future.
What we made: trifolder, bronchure and presentation materials as in banners and give aways pens, clothing buy-in and branding them. With cool ideas from Erik Overhof and me and the trust from MT and country lead Jaap Boot, we made a greate impact in events. We hope to do this more in the near future. We making more plans to promote FDS even more.

projects.title: Project Libertel/VodafoneZiggo (projects: 100+)
projects.description: Libertel/Vodafone NL was a very dynamic company, likes to change and adapt to current market, resulting in a lot of reorganizations, employments and moves. Kind of lost it's moves when organization settled in Amsterdam ODE, Utrecht Papendorp, Eindhoven ESP and Maastricht. After a while Ziggo merger came it gained a lot of locations, it narrow down to Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Groningen, Nijmegen, New Utrecht CO, Helmond and Maastricht. Now Convid-19 hit us all. Only future will tell how this organization will bloom again.

projects.title: Connected Working 2.0
projects.description: After 23 years VodafoneZiggo decided to close down some floors from our building White, fase 2, in Maastricht for the old timers of us! Moving out 580 work spots and exchanging  hardware for about 1000 workplaces in building Red. Implementing AV technology and workplace management; New Connected working 2.0 for the employees of VodafoneZiggo. Glad/proud to be part of the project, let's do this together now!

profile_positions.description:
MarCom Project FDS, continue to advertise for FDS. Our brand has to be heard. Creating brochures, trifold and branding materials for FDS, as in give aways pens and usb-stick, design poloshirt and fleeze jackets to wear for our engineers where possible. Reporting directly to MT and CTO. I was given the opportunity to be in the group (4 colleagues) for the speak up pole (voice from colleagues to company), forming bridges and take action to work to be a better company for our employees.
With Erik Overhof we creating ideas to invest in future students, internalships, schools to enhance interest in IT, we present them to MT and CTO. Earning them a job for future with FDS or DXC and get the best out of their talents. 
Still working in technical area, Enrollment Call and Dispatch, supporting sites: Collings Aerospace, O-I Maastricht, Sompo International Cologne Germany and Luxembourg.
We will see what future brings forward.
profile_positions.title: Deskside Support Technician Call&Dispatch

profile_positions.description:
Radisson Hotel Group
Responsible for Ticket handling Servicedesk+, dispatching and resolving level 1 Helpdesk and structuring Level 3 and 4, Learning the landscape Emma, SAP, deep security and restructuring Helpdesk, all this needed to be in documentation. Will try to get focus and hypercare as part as a service for customer. 
I am part of an restructure team with a mission to create process and order in to Helpdesk functions ending to support 3rd line a good as possible. 
2nd line functions are tape handling on small clusterserver and some contract management on the servers, day-to-day uploading reports in Opera/Sokos oracles systems in xml formats. Still do some local support, but in small office there little incidents. 
3rd line functions Renewal SSL Certifications Trust zone, Deep security and Trendmicro systems support. Hope to learn more Azure, AD and other functions as well.
profile_positions.title: Deskside Support Technician

profile_positions.description:
Part of the jobs in incident management and request management via BMC Remedy systems.
A lot of previous controlled work within my job responsibilities are given back to be controlled by VodafoneZiggo. (Printerpark, network projects Wi-Fi and fixed, Vc's and SFB/Teams rooms,  etc not in my scope any more), I made the transition so smooth as possible as a professional. 
Doing projects as bigger part of my job this year. Upcoming projects, workplace management, exchanging desktops for newer ones and downsizing current desktop park, Desktop project Amdocs, project Helmond - Eindhoven, mini MER cleanup project, setting up Teams rooms and exchanging elder video conference rooms for newer models and many others to come.

For FDS my experience is extended to Sompo Assurence Banking in Luxemburg and Cologne Germany and Collings Aerospace in Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Desksite Support Engineer III

profile_positions.description:
Liberty Global merge with Vodafone! Now working for Vodafone - Ziggo. 

My work goes over the borders from Vodafone NL to Vodafone Procurement Centre in Luxembourg, great challenges to take and expand my network even more.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Customer Support Engineer

profile_positions.company: CDS, a Hewlett Packard Enterprise company
profile_positions.description:
I'm responsible for resolving technical calls 2nd line and some 3rd line support, supporting users with software and hardware problems, remote or on location.
Making Business contacts peer to peer based, resulting of casting new projects for our company .
Do small and bigger projects for the present customer.
Learning and implementing new technology.
Assetmanagement and printerpark management
Mobile Customer Service Support, travel about 55.000 km/year, Capelle aan den IJssel, Eindhoven, Utrecht, Bodegraven, Amstelveen.
VIP support, supporting VC Cisco systems, Dhcp, printerpark support as ordering print consumables retails shops and in-house printers, Narrow Casting devices, networksupport hands and eyes, Chain management to Ericsson, Xerox, Ricoh, Heuvelman, Avex and VF group. This was the best job in the world!
profile_positions.title: Sr. Support Engineer for Vodafone Account

profile_positions.description:
Do small and bigger projects for the present customer.
Resolving calls/incidents (trouble shooting) software/hardware and tasks (IMAC's), change management based. (Support: Vodafone, Amdocs (single support) and HP).
Implementing/support the mobile concept way of working for Vodafone. Having some influence in the end design and advice where necessary.
Responsible for ordering printer supplies for all Vodafone Stores in The Netherlands and onsite office environments (home printers).
Monitoring all printers for Vodafone for break fix, support, maintenance and consumables.
Supporting and installing Video Conference systems (Tandberg)
profile_positions.title: Sr. Customer Delivery Engineer

profile_positions.description:
System Administrator Associate - Support Engineer for Vodafone Account at EDS 
Taking on small projects for the present customer and taking part of bigger projects with the present customer.
Resolving calls/incidents (trouble shooting) and tasks (IMAC's), change management based.
Asset Management CMDB (ITSM Openview), Desktool and Remedy.
Patching IP Phones, network connections and digital ericsson 212/213 phones.
Remote support; Remote Desktop Connection, Dameware NT Utilities and remote Excec
Wireless support and software install on Laptops and Desktops.
Laser and Business Printers (HP and Xerox) and hardware/software support.
Tapes store management for +180 servers, Barcode tape library types: 2/20, 4/40 and 6/60, also maintained the hardware for the tape library, maintained 2 server tape store environments LVS and LNO. Made a work process model for the work that had to be done and how to use the software. The software: Veritas, ARC Serve 6.1 and 2000.
profile_positions.title: System Administrator Associate for Vodafone Account

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for moves within the company, end to end based up to 11 workplaces 2 days a week. Patching jobs for digital/analoge phoneslines PABX and data lines in SER's. Placing workspaces to ARBO norms and arrange cables power/data in the proper way.
CMDB administrator and later on Asset Management for Vodafone.
Small projects; internal moves within the company up to 20 workplaces.
Assisting in big move projects 250 workspaces, checking move matrix's.
Making inventory for EDS for all the assets at account Libertel/Vodafone, made update to CMDB for 96% complete (Target completion 90%). As a reward for the success and dedication, EDS offered me a contract.
Lease Management exchange for hardware, desktops, notebooks, etc.
Made a setup for Store Management for Vodafone, after working out the workplan Asset Management was born; combining Store and lease management, Break-fix, updating CMDB, Asset registration, ordering Hardware spare parts, change and incident management.
profile_positions.title: Computer associate for EDS at Libertel/Vodafone
